feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 a.m. PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
